news.title: Africa records highest stablecoin conversion spreads, data shows
news.titleOriginal: Africa records highest stablecoin conversion spreads, data shows
news.summary: Data observed across 66 corridors in Africa shows conversion costs from 1.5% to 19% in January, with competition driving pricing gaps.
